title: ROBERT BAILEY BESPOKE
home_welcome_message_r1: The very finest in luxury bespoke tailoring since 1985
home_land_1_detail_r1:
With over 38 years experience in Savile Bow, Robert Bailey Bespoke offers
the finest experience in bespoke tailoring.
trunkshow_story01: We regularly travel across Asia and Pacific Region and other continents to meet with our clients to provide the best possible bespoke sartorial experience for you.
trunkshow_story02: We provide a wide range of fabric collections, ranging from the pure 100% wool worsted suiting to the finest vicuñas and everything you could possibly need for any occasion from white-tie state dinners to casual trousers to wear on a daily basis.
trunkshow_story03: There is not anything that we cannot provide for you.
trunkshow_story04:
If it's a sartorial garment for a lady or a gentleman,
then we can create it together for you.
trunkshow_story05: Our regular trunk shows include Beijing, Shanghai, Chengdu, Hong Kong, Taipei, Seoul, Tokyo, Bangkok, Singapore and Melbourne; we visit all cities 3 to 4 times per year.
accessories_story_detail01: We are incredibly proud to be suppliers of Albert Thurston made braces.
accessories_story_detail02: Available to order through our website or available during our bespoke trunk shows only.
accessories_story_detail03:
For any order made especially for you we can have made bespoke for you,

accessories_story_detail04: (Albert Thurston has become a by-word for quality in gentlemen’s' accessories and braces/suspenders.
accessories_story_detail05: They have been sported by kings, princes, presidents and successful businessmen across the world over the past two centuries) Robert Bailey Bespoke braces are available in all colours shown or by special order for a variety of colours.

gall_story01: At Robert Bailey Bespoke we have the experience and knowledge to create absolutely amazing sartorial masterpieces that are made only for you.
gall_story02: Every detail on each garment you order is created especially for you exactly where you require it for the most convenient and practical position no matter what your lifestyle.
gall_story03: Each garment is made exclusively for you with your needs at the forefront of the design.
gall_story04: Our gallery shows some of the, but not all of our creations with more added from time to time.
ult_fontmain_l2_r1:
There are no shortcut in the bespoke process and
no compromises when it comes to fit, quality and craft.
ult_story00_r1:
We provide an unrivalled bespoke experience to ensure you receive a beautiful, perfectly-fitted garment every time.
From our initial consultation to the final fitting, we ensure that your needs are met every step of the way.
ult_story01: At our initial consultation, we will discuss your wants and needs from your new bespoke garments. It is important to us to establish when and where you will want to be wearing your new clothing.
ult_story02: For every visit, we will bring over 3,000 different choices of cloth for you to choose from. These will range from lightweight to heavyweight, business to pleasure, formal to informal, and include materials suitable for overcoating, trousers and everything in between.
ult_story03:
The most important part of the process is for us to take as much information about your figure and proportions as possible, before cutting your pattern back in the UK.
For this reason, we take over 35 difference measurements from you, each one an important part of our pattern cutting technique.
ult_story04: Upon returning to our workshop, we will create your own individual pattern which will be kept and updated after every meeting we make together. This will be stored in our secure pattern room and kept safe for our use only.
ult_story05:
Once we are satisfied with your new pattern, we will mark onto the cloth and cut with generous inlays for any adjustments that may be necessary in the future.
The cut cloth will then be given to one of our finest and most experienced tailors to prepare the garment for its first fitting.
ult_story06: Having made an appointment for your first fitting, you will try on the garments and together we will discuss the comfort and the look, making sure we are both more than satisfied with how your garments are progressing.
ult_story07: Back in the UK, we will adjust your pattern and re-cut the garments as per our discussions in the first fitting appointment. The tailors will then finish the garments in preparation for your finished fitting appointment.
ult_story08_r1:
At this appointment, we will make sure we are both happy and satisfied with everything that has been made for you.
All being well, your suit or garments are now ready for you to wear at your leisure!
ult_story09: If after your first purchase you require adjustments or wish to add to your bespoke collection, we can arrange another appointment for our next regular visit.
about_story01: In July 1985  I working at Gieves & Hawkes (Camberley) where my father was head cutter. He was the 3rd generation of tailor in the Bailey bloodline, making me the 4th generation of bespoke tailor in my family.
about_story03: The call of working in Savile Row was too strong and I was delighted to get a cutting apprenticeship at Davies and Son in Old Burlington Street as a trainee cutter in 1990.
about_story04: In 1996 Gieves & Hawkes in Savile Row had a cutting position available so worked at No.1 Savile Row.  After a couple of years there I moved to Dege & Skinner in Savile Row to gain priceless sartorial experience and learn from company owner Michael Skinner , one of the best tutors in the trade.
about_story06: After 11 years at Dege & Skinner I decided to cross Savile Row to Davies and Son where I tasted my first experience of Asia. At Davies & Son I was Head Cutter, production director including travelling to Tokyo and Seoul.
about_story07: But my desire to make Asia a greater focus of my services took me to Huntsman of Savile Row. Due to my experience in Japan and South Korea they gave me the position of creating and maintaining the Asia trunk shows.
about_story10: I developed a reputation for being able to produce a perfect garment for each client on their own doorstep despite the distance from the U.K.
about_story12: The service I offer is to create an immaculate fitting bespoke garment that fits like a glove yet has the comfort and feel as if it's not even there , and is made by the worlds finest tailors whilst cut and trimmed by my own hands to make even the most difficult of figures look and feel completely immaculate !
